original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2076)@</color>斬出兩波半月形劍氣沿著地表直線衝擊，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2076)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2076)@</color> Cut out two waves of half-moon sword energy along the surface of the earth and hit them in a straight line with <color=# ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2076)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
